man.description: Show usage information for command. Type 'man' to see all commands

poll.description:
Create 'yes/no' poll. React with üëç for yes and üëé for no.
Automatically add 'here' group to the start of the message.

role.description: Allow to set/remove role by reacting on a "role message".
role.role_is_higher_or_equals: Role is higher or equals to yours.

permissions.ADMINISTRATOR: Allows all permissions and bypasses channel permission overwrites
permissions.MANAGE_CHANNELS: Allows management and editing of channels
permissions.MANAGE_GUILD: Allows management and editing of the guild
permissions.ADD_REACTIONS: Allows for the addition of reactions to messages
permissions.VIEW_AUDIT_LOG: Allows for viewing of audit logs
permissions.VIEW_CHANNEL: Allows guild members to view a channel, which includes reading messages in text channels
permissions.SEND_MESSAGES: Allows for sending messages in a channel
permissions.MANAGE_MESSAGES: Allows for deletion of other users messages
permissions.EMBED_LINKS: Links sent by users with this permission will be auto-embedded
permissions.ATTACH_FILES: Allows for uploading images and files
permissions.READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY: Allows for reading of message history
permissions.MENTION_EVERYONE: Allows for using the @everyone tag to notify all users in a channel, and the @here tag to notify all online users in a channel
permissions.USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS: Allows the usage of custom emojis from other servers
permissions.CONNECT: Allows for joining of a voice channel
permissions.SPEAK: Allows for speaking in a voice channel
permissions.MUTE_MEMBERS: Allows for muting members in a voice channel
permissions.DEAFEN_MEMBERS: Allows for deafening of members in a voice channel
permissions.MOVE_MEMBERS: Allows for moving of members between voice channels
permissions.USE_VAD: Allows for using voice-activity-detection in a voice channel
permissions.PRIORITY_SPEAKER: Allows for using priority speaker in a voice channel
permissions.STREAM: Allows the user to go live
permissions.CHANGE_NICKNAME: Allows for modification of own nickname
permissions.MANAGE_NICKNAMES: Allows for modification of other users nicknames
permissions.MANAGE_ROLES: Allows management and editing of roles
permissions.MANAGE_WEBHOOKS: Allows management and editing of webhooks
permissions.MANAGE_EMOJIS: Allows management and editing of emojis
